JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description & key roles:      Develop and maintain dynamic APIs     Develop and maintain server side applications which interact with various data stores     Write reusable, testable, and efficient code     Unit testing & bug fixing     Integrating user-facing elements with back-end applications     Integrating with various third party APIs      Technical Stack Requirement:      Strong understanding of Python   Web frameworks: Django   Web servers: Apache / Nginx   Data Stores: MySQL / PostgreSQL     Working knowledge of Rest APIs and microservices     Version Control: Git     Server Knowledge: Basics of Linux     Cloud Infrastructure: Basics of AWS     Web Technologies: Good understanding of JavaScript and basics of HTML5 & CSS      Required skill sets      Enjoys solving problems   Passionate about programming   Attention to detail     Adaptable to the current requirement      Bonus Point If      Eagerness to work in the Fin-tech and Stock Market domain
